owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._DataBatchId: Integer identifier associated with the target FormattedData

params._DataBatchId: Integer identifier associated with target FormattedData

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

validPosition(uint256,uint256,address,ui.details: Compares previous and next FormattedData's committed tokens for sorting purposes

params._nextID: Integer identifier associated with next FormattedData in sorted order
params._numTokens: The number of tokens to be committed towards the FormattedData (used for sorting)
params._prevID: Integer identifier associated with previous FormattedData in sorted order
params._voter: Address of user to check DLL position for

returns.APPROVED: Boolean indication of if the specified position maintains the sort

params._numTokens: The number of ERC20 tokens desired in exchange for voting rights

ValidateDataBatch(uint256).notice: Trigger the validation of a FormattedData hash; if the FormattedData has ended. If the requirements are APPROVED,  the CheckedData will be added to the APPROVED list of SpotCheckings

commitFormatCheck(uint256,bytes32,uint25.notice: Commits format-check-vote using hash of choice and secret salt to conceal format-check-vote until reveal

commitPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the commit period is still active for the specified SpottedData

getTotalNumberOfFormatChecks(uint256).notice: Trigger the validation of a FormattedData hash; if the FormattedData has ended. If the requirements are APPROVED,  the FormatChecking will be added to the APPROVED list of FormatCheckings

revealFormatCheck(uint256,uint256,string.notice: Reveals format-check-vote with choice and secret salt used in generating commitHash to attribute committed tokens

revealPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the reveal period is still active for the specified FormattedData

withdrawVotingRights(uint256).notice: Withdraw _numTokens ERC20 tokens from the voting contract, revoking these voting rights
